wikipedia_page.main: The Honourable Mary Augusta Pakington  (1878 – 1949) was an English playwright and actor and daughter of the Third Baron Hampton.

response: Mary Pakington, the daughter of Herbert Perrott Murray Pakington (1848–1906), the Third Baron Hampton, was an English dramatist. In 1906 Herbert Stuart (born 1883) became the 4th Baron Hampton.
